message: Looking good so far.
it's a REST web app through and through :)
it's cool that Convore could build one, but to me it's not that big of a part of the convore narrative, besides just being really great at making software :)
Nice work on the iPhone app! It is really responsive!
I was unable to log in with my email address, but logging in with my username worked
One bit of feedback - if I search for a group I don't just want to join the group... I probably want to he able to go to that group from the search results.
And fix typos heh.
also, password reset emails are coming from "webmaster@localhost"
@pmclanahan Yes that is perfect, also I just fixed the webmaster@localhost thing, it's pushing out to the servers now.

@pmclanahan So everyone needs to choose a password when they join, even if from Twitter/FB but understandable if it's hard to remember the password...how is password reset failing? Is it giving you an error message?
@ericflo is this the right forum for support questions like this? didn't see a support link.
unable to login via iPod Touch. signed up w/ twitter account so I don't think I have a password. I try to set one but password reset keeps failing
tried twice, same result
got it :) 3rd time was the proverbial charm... dunno.

Password reset unsuccessful
The password reset link was invalid, possibly because it has already been used. Please request a new password reset.
works now though. thanks @ericflo!
@pmclanahan hey, just saw this update, sorry that it took a couple of tries, I'll see if I can reproduce it on my end
@ericflo no worries. could have been me. I think I may have been logged in when I clicked the link the first couple of times. Perhaps there's a conflict in the view for an authenticated user?
It's definitely an edge case, but w/ your twitter integration, it is easily possible to be logged in but not know your PW.
you guys have to make sure it is IOS 4.3 tested since it is crashing and i had to reinstall it a couple of times
@dmishe Unless they've changed the process, didn't you still have to create a user ID and password for Convore even when signing up with Facebook/Twitter?
totally forgot
thx
is it fully native, or UIWebView wrapper?
how do i login if i signed up with facebook?
oh true
looks nice
@dmishe native
It's a little bit slower (I mean, the UI animations are) than other apps
The app works great for me. Now we need photo support so we can upload from the app and the app needs to be setup for the iPad too. Great work convore!
Will you guys be adding push notifications like everyhour or so tells how many unread or when your mentioned?
@italiano40 push can be a pain to implement: the certs, the badge resets, and how best to ping your users efficiently.
Best way to do notifications would be if someone mentions you. Also stop sending them if more than 2 has been sent but you have ignored them?

Just to chime in I'm actually not excited about notifications. My phone makes enough sound and vibration already. But I can see where someone following a high value topic would want that. But for me for right now - not a feature I'd use. My 2 cents.
@barce yea I hear you but like the email just push that to my phone instead and also they need to make sorting but most unread post too
Can links to groups be made to open in the app by default?
What is the topic list edit mode meant to do?
Can has landscape mode for two thumb typing?
Links to topics should stay in the app too.
FYI while an iPad app would also be nice convore works great in the browser on the iPad
Don't implement push interruptions, please. I'm too lazy to open Settings and turn them off for another app.
@myfreeweb you could always say no for the first time to avoid any push... or switch the push function completely ;-)
I want to tap avatars and see their profiles
+1 for visiting groups without needing to join them. Especially when considering the 20 group limit (just in theory)
@lstryder I thought it was a 50 group limit.
Okay, so 3 things. Landscape view, push notifications, and user information editor.
@ahonorstudent also sort groups by most unread messages
I'd like to see the browser in the app so I don't switch to safari every time I click a pic
@craig it could be. I'm not sure now
Looks like I broke something… -1 unread message: http://mfwb.us/wtRM
@ericflo I can't login to the iphone app since I signed up with FB and don't have a password. It asks for my old password to reset, but I don't know it. FB password doesn't work :(
@Emma We make everyone choose a password no matter how they register, but going to https://convore.com/password-reset/ should help you change it using only your e-mail address.
I kinda would like am in-app browser for links, that can bring me right back to convore...

Why NOT have push notifications? You can always turn them off if you don't want them, but I WANT to be notified when someone posts. I'm a member of two private groups where communication is important.
Badge notifications over email notifications, please
@kenanigans AGREED!
@atomicules done. this feature is coming in the next release. :)
When marking groups as read would be nice to automatically go back to the group lists screen in a similar vein to Reeder app
@leah fab! Thanks. And for the quick reply as well.
+1 for landscape keyboard and notifications/badges
